title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Character Education Participation Design for Pre-Service Teachers: RECE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and resolve real-life character education problems by utilizing the RECE model (Reflection-Engagement-Collaboration-Elaboration)
Learners can conduct collaborative reflection with peers via mobile platforms and visually represent discussion outcomes
Learners can create character education implementation plans through project-based assessments and incorporate feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
